medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain worsened and migrated to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began approximately 48 hours ago, initially dull and epigastric, but worsened to sharp pain and migrated to the right lower quadrant. The patient has had nausea and has not eaten in 48 hours. No fever, chills, or previous episodes of similar pain were reported.
